thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Power Integrations Q1 Revenue $103.1 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Power Integrations Q1 Revenue $103.1 Million
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Power Integrations Inc:
* POWER INTEGRATIONS REPORTS FIRST-QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.67
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.46 * Q1 REVENUE $103.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $102.8 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.59 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE ABOUT $109 MILLION * SEES 2018 GAAP GROSS MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY 51 PERCENT
* SEES 2018 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY 52 PERCENT
* 2018 GAAP OPERATING EXPENSES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $41.5 MILLION
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $109.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
